front.title: Interactions between PMIPv6 and MIPv6: scenarios and related issues

abstract.t: The scenarios where Proxy Mobile IPv6 (PMIPv6) and Mobile IPv6 (MIPv6) protocols are both deployed in a network require some analysis and considerations. This document describes all identified possible scenarios, which require an interaction between PMIPv6 and MIPv6 and discusses all issues related to these scenarios. Solutions and recommendations to enable these scenarios are also described.
